allow: Bash(.venvScriptspython.exe manage.py shell -c "from attendance.models import AttendanceUpload; print\(''Existing uploads:''\); [print\(f''  ID:{u.id} School:{u.school_id} Class:{u.class_obj_id} Date:{u.date} Status:{u.status}''\) for u in AttendanceUpload.objects.all\(\)]; AttendanceUpload.objects.all\(\).delete\(\); print\(''All uploads deleted.''\)")
